name: Balloon Critter - LD42
description:
LD42 Jam Entry. My first Ludum Dare attempt/game.

You play as a hypochondriac critter.. afraid of the air and germs out in the world, so it journeys inside of a balloon.

This balloon isn’t of the highest quality, so it gradually runs of space, slowing down, and eventually suffocating the poor critter, so you must make sure to collect and eat cans of beans to fill the balloon back up.

This is essentially an endless runner type game, with 5 levels to complete.

Controls: WASD | ESC to Quit
